title: Voidinal
desc:
Post 2123
- When played, choose a player
- This card is played in their identity zone, removing any previous identity
- Nobody will know you played this card, a Wild card will be shown as played on the play pile
- A copy of every played card (after this is player) is also played in this
 - This no longer happens and this card is revealed in the identity zone when you or the chosen player draws a card
